snippet: Federal investigators have accused a Queens foundry owner of trying to sell an unauthorized copy of a Jasper Johns sculpture on which he forged the artist's signature.
abstract: Federal investigators have accused a Queens foundry owner of trying to sell an unauthorized copy of a Jasper Johns sculpture on which he forged the artist's signature.

headline.main: Authorities Cast Queens Foundry Owner as Forger
headline.print_headline: Queens Foundry Owner Accused of Forgery
